title: Senior Housing - 62 and older Community - Open Waitlist - No Smoking -
posting_body: Our community offers spacious studio and one-bedroom apartments.
Features such as emergency pull cords, balconies, and many events for our residents.
CALL US TODAY to make it your new home!
Villa Serena Senior Apartments is an income-restricted community.
The rental amount is determined based on income.
Contact our on-site management team to get more information or set up a visit to your new home!
Call Office for Information on Availability*
*SOME UTILITIES INCLUDED* Call the office for more information
*Weight Restrictions* - Call the office for more information
WHO ELSE CAN OFFER YOU ALL THIS?
Monday - Friday: 8:30 AM – 5 PM *By Appointment Only*
Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised apartment.
Please contact us today for the most up-to-date information!
